generateAutomataIndices

public void generateAutomataIndices(Automata theAutomata)
Give each automaton a unique index Remember that this index must be consistent with getAutomatonAt(int) in Automata

defineTypeIsPlantTable

public void defineTypeIsPlantTable(Automata plantAutomata)
Defines the typeIsPlantTable to "point to" the automata in plantAutomata in spite of what these automata (or the other automata in theAutomata, for that matter) really are!! The other automata are considered Supervisors.

Parameters:
plantAutomata - The automata that should be considered plants. The other automata are considered upervisors.
